text: V Sport Extra is a television channel owned by Nordic Entertainment Group broadcasting to Sweden. It specializes in HD sports. The channel started broadcasting on 8 April 2016. The channel is sometimes broadcast as TV3 Sport without HD. In 1 June 2020 TV3 Sport HD was rebranded to V Sport Extra. ==References== Category:Nordic Entertainment Group Category:Television channels in Sweden Category:Television channels and stations established in 2016 Category:2016 establishments in Sweden
title: V Sport Extra
